0:["vJ0QDhy9vpwjApfeLcwku",[[["",{"children":["lesson",{"children":["tailwind",{"children":["layout",{"children":["container",{"children":["__PAGE__",{}]}]}]}]}]},"$undefined","$undefined",true],["",{"children":["lesson",{"children":["tailwind",{"children":["layout",{"children":["container",{"children":["__PAGE__",{},[["$L1",["$","div",null,{"children":[[["$","h1","h1-0",{"children":"Container"}],"\n",["$","p","p-0",{"children":"A component for fixing an element's width to the current breakpoint.\nQuick reference"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-0",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"Class       Breakpoint          Properties\ncontainer\t    None\t        width: 100%;\n            sm (640px)\t        max-width: 640px;\n            md (768px)\t        max-width: 768px;\n            lg (1024px)\t        max-width: 1024px;\n            xl (1280px)\t        max-width: 1280px;\n            2xl (1536px)\t    max-width: 1536px;\n\nhttps://tailwindcss.com/docs/responsive-design\nBreakpoint-prefix\tMinimum-width\t    CSS\nsm\t                640px\t            @media (min-width: 640px) { ... }\nmd\t                768px\t            @media (min-width: 768px) { ... }\nlg\t                1024px\t            @media (min-width: 1024px) { ... }\nxl\t                1280px\t            @media (min-width: 1280px) { ... }\n2xl\t                1536px\t            @media (min-width: 1536px) { ... }\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-0",{"children":"Basic usage"}],"\n",["$","p","p-1",{"children":"Using the container\nThe container class sets the max-width of an element to match the min-width of the current breakpoint.\n这个类设计在当前断点的最大宽度\nThis is useful if you’d prefer to design for a fixed set of screen sizes instead of trying\nto accommodate a fully fluid viewport."}],"\n",["$","p","p-2",{"children":"Note that unlike containers you might have used in other frameworks, Tailwind’s container does not center itself automatically and does not have any built-in horizontal padding."}]],["$","div",null,{"className":"container border-2  border-sky-500","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container w-3/5","children":"默认无法居中？"}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto border-2  border-sky-500","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container w-3/5 mx-auto","children":"mx-auto 可居中"}]}],[["$","h1","h1-0",{"children":"Customizing"}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-0",{"children":"Centering by default"}],"\n",["$","p","p-0",{"children":"To center containers by default, set the center option to true in the theme.container section of your config file:"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-0",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"tailwind.config.js\n/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */\nmodule.exports = {\ntheme: {\ncontainer: {\ncenter: true,\n},\n},\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-1",{"children":"Adding horizontal padding"}],"\n",["$","p","p-1",{"children":"To add horizontal padding by default, specify the amount of padding you’d like using the padding option in the theme.container section of your config file:"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-1",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"tailwind.config.js\n/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */\nmodule.exports = {\ntheme: {\ncontainer: {\npadding: '2rem',\n},\n},\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","p","p-2",{"children":"If you want to specify a different padding amount for each breakpoint, use an object to provide a default value and any breakpoint-specific overrides:"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-2",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"tailwind.config.js\n/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */\nmodule.exports = {\ntheme: {\ncontainer: {\npadding: {\nDEFAULT: '1rem',\nsm: '2rem',\nlg: '4rem',\nxl: '5rem',\n'2xl': '6rem',\n},\n},\n},\n};\n"}]}]]]}]],null],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children","layout","children","container","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children","layout","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children","tailwind","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L2",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","lesson","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L3",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},[["$","html",null,{"children":["$","body",null,{"className":"container
